dose range: 1 to 6 mg, IV, once, PRN anxiety, drug form: inj
For gestation over 14 weeks, select oxytocin
20 unit, IV, once, drug form: inj

Considerations:   
- Select oxytocin for preventative treatment of bleeding for patients over 14 weeks  
- Ergonovine is contraindicated in patients with hypertension OR with HIV on protease inhibitors  
- Avoid use of carboprost in patients with renal, hepatic or cardiac disease. Use with caution in patients with asthma  
- Use tranexamic acid with caution in patients with pre-existing renal impairment or seizure history   
- Flumazenil is contraindicated in patients with seizure disorder or known or suspected benzodiazepine dependence
